I have another shot at this Alaska job, should hear sometime this week if I got it. I hope that happens.

Things I fantasize about: *not telling anyone except the most essential people I’m going. *taking pictures in cool places along the way (multi-day drive) *starting over away from pressures of people that I know/who know me *I get to be alone pretty much *I get to host Morning Edition which means I get up early *I would probably buy a kayak *consistent source of money *working in a station that is majority volunteer-run

I don’t know why it feels like I need to abandon my surroundings/friend groups every ~2 years. This seems like the most extreme version of that.
